    Class
    Description
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Layout
    since 21.1. Use Shape.Builder instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType
    no replacement; dynamic type no longer needs to inherit from ObjectType.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.utilities.JSONHelper
    This class is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

    com.oracle.svm.core.annotate.AutomaticFeature
    com.oracle.truffle.api.HostCompilerDirectives.BytecodeInterpreterSwitchBoundary
    use is no longer needed. boundaries for HostCompilerDirectives.BytecodeInterpreterSwitch are mostly determined automatically. To migrate remove all usages.

  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebuggerSession.isBreakpointsActive()
    Use DebuggerSession.isBreakpointsActive(Breakpoint.Kind) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebuggerSession.setBreakpointsActive(boolean)
    Use DebuggerSession.setBreakpointsActive(Breakpoint.Kind, boolean) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebugScope.getArguments()
    since 20.3 Use DebugScope.getDeclaredValues() on the SourceElement.ROOT.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebugValue.as(Class<T>)
    Use DebugValue.toDisplayString() instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebugValue.set(Object)
    in 21.2. Use set(DebugValue.getSession().createPrimitiveValue(primitiveValue, null)) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.BooleanField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.ByteField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.CharField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.DoubleField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.FloatField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.IntField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.LongField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.ReferenceField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.ShortField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.StateField.createParentAccessor(Class<? extends Node>)
    in 23.1 - no longer needed
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.EventContext.createError(RuntimeException)
    No substitute. Runtime exceptions can now be thrown directly and will be observable by the guest language application.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.ExecutionEventListener.onInputValue(EventContext, VirtualFrame, EventContext, int, Object)
    in 20.0. input value notifications are not functional for listeners. Use event node factories instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.Instrumenter.attachExecutionEventListener(SourceSectionFilter, SourceSectionFilter, T)
    inputFilters do not work for execution event listeners Use Instrumenter.attachExecutionEventFactory(SourceSectionFilter, SourceSectionFilter, ExecutionEventNodeFactory) or use Instrumenter.attachExecutionEventListener(SourceSectionFilter, ExecutionEventListener) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.Instrumenter.attachLoadSourceListener(SourceSectionFilter, T, boolean)
    Use Instrumenter.attachLoadSourceListener(SourceFilter, LoadSourceListener, boolean)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.TruffleInstrument.createContextLocal(TruffleInstrument.ContextLocalFactory<T>)
    in 23.1, use TruffleInstrument.ContextLocalProvider.createContextLocal(TruffleInstrument.ContextLocalFactory) instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.TruffleInstrument.createContextThreadLocal(TruffleInstrument.ContextThreadLocalFactory<T>)
    in 23.1, use TruffleInstrument.ContextLocalProvider.createContextThreadLocal(TruffleInstrument.ContextThreadLocalFactory) instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.TruffleInstrument.Env.getTruffleFile(String)
    since 23.0. Use TruffleInstrument.Env.getTruffleFile(TruffleContext, String).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation.TruffleInstrument.Env.getTruffleFile(URI)
    since 23.0. Use TruffleInstrument.Env.getTruffleFile(TruffleContext, URI).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.interop.InteropException.initCause(Throwable)
    Do no longer use the cause will be initialized finally.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.BytecodeOSRNode.copyIntoOSRFrame(VirtualFrame, VirtualFrame, int)
    since 22.2
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node.getCost()
    in 24.1 without replacement
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.NodeInfo.cost()
    in 24.1 without replacement
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.RootNode.isCaptureFramesForTrace()
    in 24.1, implement and use RootNode.isCaptureFramesForTrace(Node) instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.SlowPathException.fillInStackTrace()
    the method will become final in future releases.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.BooleanLocation.getBoolean(DynamicObject, boolean)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.BooleanLocation.getBoolean(DynamicObject, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.BooleanLocation.setBoolean(DynamicObject, boolean, Shape)

    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.DoubleLocation.getDouble(DynamicObject, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.DoubleLocation.setDouble(DynamicObject, double, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.IntLocation.getInt(DynamicObject, boolean)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.IntLocation.getInt(DynamicObject, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.IntLocation.setInt(DynamicObject, int, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.LayoutFactory.createProperty(Object, Location, int)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.canSet(Object)
    Equivalent to Location.canStore(Object).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.finalLocation()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.get(DynamicObject)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.get(DynamicObject, boolean)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.get(DynamicObject, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.incompatibleLocation()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.isDeclared()
    No longer needed. Declared locations can only be created with deprecated APIs.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.set(DynamicObject, Object, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Location.set(DynamicObject, Object, Shape, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.LongLocation.getLong(DynamicObject, boolean)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.LongLocation.getLong(DynamicObject, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.LongLocation.setLong(DynamicObject, long, Shape)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType.dispatch()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType.equals(DynamicObject, Object)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType.hashCode(DynamicObject)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType.toString(DynamicObject)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Property.create(Object, Location, int)
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Property.get(DynamicObject, boolean)
    Use DynamicObjectLibrary.getOrDefault(DynamicObject, Object, Object).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Property.get(DynamicObject, Shape)
    Use DynamicObjectLibrary.getOrDefault(DynamicObject, Object, Object).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Shape.defineProperty(Object, Object, int)
    Use DynamicObjectLibrary.put(DynamicObject, Object, Object) or DynamicObjectLibrary.putWithFlags(DynamicObject, Object, Object, int).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.profiles.ConditionProfile.createBinaryProfile()
    use ConditionProfile.create() instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.profiles.ConditionProfile.createCountingProfile()
    use CountingConditionProfile instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.profiles.LoopConditionProfile.createCountingProfile()
    use LoopConditionProfile.create() instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.AbstractTruffleString.copyToByteArrayNodeUncached(int, byte[], int, int, TruffleString.Encoding)
    since 22.3, use AbstractTruffleString.copyToByteArrayUncached(int, byte[], int, int, Encoding) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.AbstractTruffleString.copyToNativeMemoryNodeUncached(int, Object, int, int, TruffleString.Encoding)
    since 22.3, use AbstractTruffleString.copyToNativeMemoryUncached(int, Object, int, int, Encoding) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.AbstractTruffleString.isCompatibleTo(TruffleString.Encoding)
    use AbstractTruffleString.isCompatibleToUncached(Encoding) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleContext.leaveAndEnter(Node, Supplier<T>)
    Use TruffleContext.leaveAndEnter(Node, Interrupter, InterruptibleFunction, Object) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleFile.getMimeType()
    use TruffleFile.detectMimeType()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.createContextLocal(TruffleLanguage.ContextLocalFactory<C, T>)
    in 23.1, use TruffleLanguage.ContextLocalProvider.createContextLocal(TruffleLanguage.ContextLocalFactory) instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.createContextThreadLocal(TruffleLanguage.ContextThreadLocalFactory<C, T>)
    in 23.1, use TruffleLanguage.ContextLocalProvider.createContextThreadLocal(TruffleLanguage.ContextThreadLocalFactory) instead
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createHostAdapterClass(Class<?>[])
    since 22.1; replaced by TruffleLanguage.Env.createHostAdapter(Object[]).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createHostAdapterClassWithStaticOverrides(Class<?>[], Object)
    since 22.1; replaced by TruffleLanguage.Env.createHostAdapterWithClassOverrides(Object[], Object).
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createThread(Runnable)
    Use TruffleLanguage.Env.newTruffleThreadBuilder(Runnable) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createThread(Runnable, TruffleContext)
    Use TruffleLanguage.Env.newTruffleThreadBuilder(Runnable) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createThread(Runnable, TruffleContext, ThreadGroup)
    Use TruffleLanguage.Env.newTruffleThreadBuilder(Runnable) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.createThread(Runnable, TruffleContext, ThreadGroup, long)
    Use TruffleLanguage.Env.newTruffleThreadBuilder(Runnable) instead.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.isIOAllowed()
    since 23.0; replaced by TruffleLanguage.Env.isFileIOAllowed().
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.isPolyglotEvalAllowed()
    in 24.1 use isPolyglotEvalAllowed(null) instead. Note that language implementations should now check whether polyglot eval is allowed also for individual languages, as access could be denied only for an individual language.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Env.newContextBuilder()
    use TruffleLanguage.Env.newInnerContextBuilder(String...) instead. Note that the replacement method configures the context differently by default. To restore the old behavior: newInnerContextBuilder() .initializeCreatorContext(true).inheritAllAccess(true).build()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.getCurrentContext(Class<T>)
    in 21.3, use static final context references instead. See TruffleLanguage.LanguageReference for the new intended usage.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.getCurrentLanguage(Class<T>)
    in 21.3, use static final context references instead. See TruffleLanguage.ContextReference for the new intended usage.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Registration.needsAllEncodings()
    To enable all TruffleString encodings, it is sufficient to add the org.graalvm.shadowed.jcodings module to the language's module-info requires and ensure it is on the module path when languages are loaded. If the module can be found, and at least one languages requires it, all encodings are automatically enabled. When languages are loaded from the class path (i.e. as an unnamed module), having jcodings on the class path is enough to enable it.
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleSafepoint.setBlockedWithException(Node, TruffleSafepoint.Interrupter, TruffleSafepoint.Interruptible<T>, T, Runnable, Consumer<Throwable>)
    Use TruffleSafepoint.setBlocked(Node, Interrupter, Interruptible, Object, Runnable, Consumer)
    org.graalvm.nativeimage.hosted.RuntimeReflection.register(boolean, boolean, Field...)
    Use RuntimeReflection.register(Field...) instead. Parameters finalIsWritable and allowUnsafeAccess no longer serve a purpose.
    org.graalvm.nativeimage.hosted.RuntimeReflection.register(boolean, Field...)
    Use RuntimeReflection.register(Field...) instead. Parameter finalIsWritable no longer serves a purpose.
    org.graalvm.options.OptionType.getDefaultValue()
     
    org.graalvm.options.OptionValues.set(OptionKey<T>, T)
    OptionValues should be read-only. If the value of an option needs to be altered after options are set, then the new value should be stored in the language's context or instrument fields and read from there.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.Context.Builder.allowHostAccess(boolean)
    use Context.Builder.allowHostAccess(HostAccess) or Context.Builder.allowHostClassLookup(Predicate) instead.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.Context.Builder.allowIO(boolean)
    If the value was previously true pass IOAccess.ALL, otherwise pass IOAccess.NONE.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.Context.Builder.fileSystem(FileSystem)
    If a file system was previously set use allowIO(IOAccess.newBuilder().fileSystem(fileSystem).build()).
    org.graalvm.polyglot.Context.Builder.hostClassFilter(Predicate<String>)
    use Context.Builder.allowHostClassLookup(Predicate) instead.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.io.FileSystem.allowLanguageHomeAccess(FileSystem)
    Use {FileSystem.allowInternalResourceAccess(FileSystem)}.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.Source.getInputStream()
    use Source.getReader(), Source.getCharacters() or Source.getBytes() instead. The implementation is inefficient and can not distinguish byte and character based sources.
    org.graalvm.polyglot.SourceSection.getCode()
    use SourceSection.getCharacters() instead.
    org.graalvm.word.WordBase.equals(Object)
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.ObjectType()
    com.oracle.truffle.api.object.Property()
    do not use.
    org.graalvm.options.OptionType(String, T, Function<String, T>)
    Use OptionType(String, Function)
    org.graalvm.options.OptionType(String, T, Function<String, T>, Consumer<T>)
    Use OptionType(String, Function, Consumer)
  • Deprecated Annotation Interface Elements
    Annotation Interface Element
    Description
    com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.NodeInfo.cost()
    in 24.1 without replacement
    com.oracle.truffle.api.TruffleLanguage.Registration.needsAllEncodings()
    To enable all TruffleString encodings, it is sufficient to add the org.graalvm.shadowed.jcodings module to the language's module-info requires and ensure it is on the module path when languages are loaded. If the module can be found, and at least one languages requires it, all encodings are automatically enabled. When languages are loaded from the class path (i.e. as an unnamed module), having jcodings on the class path is enough to enable it.
